settings.heading: Lets talk lights
settings.paragraph:
We ship our lights to happy customers all over the world.

If you have a question about any of our lights, or if you're looking for something in particular, we're always happy to help. Please get in touch.

studio@skinflintdesign.com

01326 565227

We look forward to welcoming you to our Cornish studio by appointment only between 9am-5pm Monday to Friday (GMT).

Prop Hire

We hold Europe's largest selection of original vintage lighting for prop hire for TV, films and events - visit our prop hire page for more information.
